scripts.build:js: rimraf tmp/app-* dist/*.js.map && cp src/app.js tmp/ && uglifyjs tmp/app.js -o tmp/app-"$APPREV".min.js --source-map dist/app-"$APPREV".min.js.map --source-map-url app-"$APPREV".min.js.map --source-map-root / -m -c --screw-ie8
scripts.inject:js: npm run build:js && npm run postbuild
scripts.postinject:js: l10n-template -t tmp && rimraf dist/*.js && cp -R tmp/*.js dist/ && cp -R src/*.min.js dist/
scripts.prebuild: rimraf tmp dist && mkdir -p tmp dist && npm run move:assets
scripts.build: export APPREV=$(date +"%Y%m%d%H%M%S") && concurrently "npm run build:css" "npm run inject:js"
scripts.postbuild: node scripts/inject-resources.js && cp src/redirect.html dist/ && mv dist/redirect.html dist/index.html
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently "lite-server dist" "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js"
